entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is discussing the possibility of Mr. Crouch attacking Viktor.

entities.name: viktor
entities.description: Viktor is a person who was attacked by either Mr. Crouch or someone else.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a person who may have attacked Viktor or been attacked himself.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts who is discussing the possibility of Mr. Crouch attacking Viktor.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is discussing the possibility of Mr. Crouch attacking Viktor.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is Harry's headmaster and a person who was present when Harry arrived at the scene.

relationships.description: Harry disagrees with Ron's theory that Mr. Crouch attacked Viktor.
Ron suggests a theory that Krum attacked Crouch and then Stunned himself.
Hermione is concerned about Viktor's safety and the possibility of him being attacked.
